message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about applying reinforcement learning to optimize a neural mention-ranking model for coreference evaluation metrics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves training a neural network using reinforcement learning, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves optimizing a model, which could fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper deals with information retrieval, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
